content:
<@881163607474335764> Thanks so much for being an Online Engagement volunteer. Let us know if you need any help with Reach. You can connect with the official campaign accounts directly and retweet/share that content. Here's the updated list. Thanks again for volunteering! We are on...
 ... X (Twitter): x.com/KamalaHQ, x.com/kamalaharris, x.com/whitehouse, x.com/DNCWarRoom, x.com/TheDemocrats
 ... Facebook: facebook.com/KamalaHarris, facebook.com/WhiteHouse, facebook.com/democrats
 ... Instagram: instagram.com/kamalaharris, instagram.com/vp, instagram.com/whitehouse, instagram.com/thedemocrats, 
 … Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/kamalaharris
...TikTok: tiktok.com/@kamalaharris, tiktok.com/@thedemocrats
 … Truth Social: truthsocial.com/@KamalaHQ

I'm at the top of the REACH Ladder because my goal is to personally connect with every one of my 5000 linkedin and FB friends and ASK them to engage the campaign and if possible, use REACH.  I know most of these folks personally after being on these platforms since their inception.  My tactic is to personally message people and respond to every positive response I get to confirm their VOTE and use their networks through REACH or other.  So far, I'm meeting with excellent success.  About 1 in 5 contacts results in a "conversation" (back and forth messaging in which I can identify the voter and determine further volunteer work).  I have made approximately 1500 personal contacts thus far resulting in over 300 "conversations."  About 1/3 of these said they download or consider downloading REACH.

My strategy is to create "conversations" and to move my friends into action.  When I post anything, I'm adding an invitation to engage the campaign through REACH (on FB, Linkedin, or x or my various email groups - of which I have over 30.  If I get a like or a comment or a share, I respond to that person and try to create a conversation via message (it works more often when you're obviously dealing with a responder who shares your values).  I've created new connections in this manner and have access to a larger and larger group of confirmed supporters.

I'm developing a list of things I do daily (eg, wish friends a happy birthday on FB and ASK them to engage the campaign; respond to commenters; message friends, etc.) to create "conversations" and move people into action.

I'm hosting a Whiskey Sip n Share for Kamala and Tim on 9/6.  Open House from 5-9p with whiskies from around the world.  I'll use my email and phone contacts to nail down 15 hosts at $100-250 and then we'll recruit from there.  Goal is $5K but I'm hoping for closer to $10K.  I will use my email invitations (over 400) to encourage people to download and use REACH for their relational organizing in the digital sphere.
Don't forget Walz!  Kamala has accounts on Threads and Flickr too.
